TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Axis extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 提供方法和屬性，可用來管理 中的座標軸。

span.span: Provides methods and properties that manage axes in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會封裝為座標軸中的所有功能控制項，然後由， ，和屬性物件。This class encapsulates all the functionality for axes in the control, and is exposed by the , , and properties of objects. 所有圖表 — 除了橫條、 堆疊的橫條圖、 圓形圖和環圈圖 — 主要和次要軸如下：For all charts—except bar, stacked bar, pie and doughnut—the primary and secondary axes are as follows: |軸類型Axis Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |主要 x 軸Primary X-Axis|底部水平軸。Bottom horizontal axis.| |次要 x 軸Secondary X-Axis|頂端的水平軸。Top horizontal axis.| |主要 y 軸Primary Y-Axis|左邊的垂直軸。Left vertical axis.| |設定次要 y 軸Secondary Y-Axis|右垂直軸。Right vertical axis.| 橫條和堆疊橫條圖有其軸旋轉 90 度旋轉，所以主要 X 軸針對這兩種圖表類型是左垂直軸。Bar and stacked-bar charts have their axes rotated 90 degrees clockwise, so the primary X axis for these two chart types is the left-vertical axis. **請注意**可以有一組軸 — 兩個垂直和水平兩個 — 針對每個物件。**Note** There can be only one set of axes—two vertical and two horizontal—for each object. 類別也包含數種方法，可用來將軸值轉換為絕對像素座標，也就是適用於 2D 自訂繪圖，或可用於 3D 自訂繪圖的相對座標表示。The class also contains several methods that can be used to convert axis values to absolute pixel coordinates, which are useful for 2D custom drawing, or to relative coordinates, which are useful for 3D custom drawing. 絕對與相對座標也可轉換成軸值。Absolute and relative coordinates can also be converted to axis values. 以下是最重要的軸元素所公開類別：The following are the most important axis elements exposed by the class: |Axis 元素Axis Element|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |軸標籤Axis Labels|標籤的 [軸] 和其相關聯的屬性。The labels of an axis, and their associated properties.| |格線Grid Lines|主要和次要格線的軸。The major and minor grid lines of an axis.| |刻度Tick Marks|軸的主要和次要的刻度標記。The major and minor tick marks of an axis.| |帶狀線Strip Lines|帶狀線。Strip lines.|

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual double Crossing { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Crossing As Double
public: virtual property double Crossing { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Crossing : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸與其相關座標軸交叉的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which an axis is crossed by its associated axis.

value.span: 值，這個值表示座標軸與其相關座標軸交叉的位置。

span.span: A value that represents where an axis is crossed by its associated axis.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性主要軸將會決定主要軸交叉，而且同樣地將它設定為次要軸與另一個次要軸的交點它將會決定。Setting this property for a primary axis will determine where the other primary axis crosses it, and similarly setting it for a secondary axis will determine where the other secondary axis crosses it. 例如，設定主要 x 軸的屬性會決定主要 y 軸會跨。For example, setting the property of the primary X-axis determines where the primary Y-axis will cross it. 四種模式可用於座標軸的屬性：Four modes can be used for the property of an axis: - 「 自動 」，這表示在交叉值將會設定為相關的座標軸的最小值或最大值。"Auto", which means that the crossing value will be set to the minimum or maximum value for the relevant axis. 次要軸是否在軸為主要時，值會是其最小值，將會使用其最大值。If the axis is primary, the value will be its minimum value, if the axis is secondary it will its maximum value. 若要設定 「 自動 」，在執行階段，使用值。To set to "Auto" at run time, use a value. - 「 最低 」，這表示交叉軸的值將會最小值。"Minimum", which means the crossing value of the axis will be its minimum value. 若要在執行階段使用設定為 「 最低 」值。To set to "Minimum" at run-time use a value. - 「 最大值 」，這表示交叉軸的值將為其最大值。"Maximum", which means the crossing value of the axis will be its maximum value. 若要設定 「 上限 」 在執行階段使用值。To set to "Maximum" at run-time use a value. - 指定`double`相關座標軸的最小和最大值之間的值。A specified `double` value that is between the minimum and maximum values for the relevant axis. 如果在交叉值小於然後最小的值，或在交叉值大於最大值，就會擲回例外狀況。If the crossing value is less then minimum value, or the crossing value is greater than maximum value, an exception will be thrown. 使用非預設交叉值時，標籤與軸的刻度標記可能或可能不會遵照交叉軸中，視屬性設定。When a non-default crossing value is used, the labels and tick marks of the axis may or may not follow the crossing axis, depending on the property setting. 根據預設，它們會移動交叉軸。By default they will move with the crossing axis.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomLabels As CustomLabelsCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartCollectionEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得用來儲存 物件的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object used to store objects.

value.span: 物件。

span.span: A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來加入或移除自訂軸標籤。Use this property to add or remove custom labels for an axis. 使用物件可讓開發人員任意設定軸標籤的文字。Using objects enables the developer to arbitrarily set the text for axis labels. 只有自訂標籤可以用於第二個資料列的標籤。Only custom labels can be used in the second row of labels. 此外，如果第一個標籤資料列中使用自訂標籤，然後此第一個資料列中的所有標籤必須都是自訂標籤。Also, if a custom label is used in the first label row, then all labels in this first row must be custom labels. 也可設定從資料點，或從在軸標尺自動產生標籤。Labels can also be set from the data points, or generated automatically from the axis scale.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled Enabled { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示座標軸是否已啟用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an axis is enabled.

value.span: 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未啟用座標軸，不會顯示軸 （刻度標記、 帶狀線、 標籤、 等等），其屬性。If an axis is not enabled, the axis, along with its attributes (tick marks, strip lines, labels, and so forth), will not be displayed. 如果已啟用軸，軸，以及所有其屬性 （刻度標記、 帶狀線、 標籤、 等等），將會顯示不論是否使用它來繪製。If an axis is enabled, the axis, along with all its attributes (tick marks, strip lines, labels, and so forth), will be displayed regardless of whether or not it is being used to plot a . 如果值為是使用軸可能或可能不會顯示，根據是否使用它來繪製。If a value of is used, an axis may or may not be displayed, depending on whether it is being used to plot a . 取決於用來繪製資料的軸和屬性設定。The axes that are used to plot data are determined by the and property settings. > [!NOTE] > 如果座標軸未啟用，但相鄰的座標軸會使用格線，將會取代不會啟用軸顯示其中一個這些格線。If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果將會發生同樣的情況下座標軸的屬性設定為，但軸不會用來繪製的資料，則相鄰的軸的格線會改為繪製。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to , but the axis is not being used to plot data; the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

summary.span: 取得或設定交錯式帶狀線的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of interlaced strip lines.

value.span: 物件，表示交錯式帶狀線的色彩。

span.span: A object that represents the color of interlaced strip lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定會顯示當您叫用的交錯的帶狀線的色彩屬性。Use this property to specify the color of interlaced strip lines that are displayed when you invoke the property. 若要指定交錯式的帶狀線的框線色彩，您必須顯示使用帶狀線集合屬性，而不是屬性。To specify the border color of the interlaced strip lines, you must display the strips using the collection property instead of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Interval { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Interval : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of an axis.

value.span: 表示座標軸間隔的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the interval of an axis.

value.span: 預設值為 "Auto"，由零 (0) 這個值表示。

span.span: The default value is "Auto", which is represented by a value of zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性決定的標籤和 主要刻度標記的頻率，以及如果繪製軸相關聯的格線`Interval`標籤、 刻度記號或格線的屬性值設定為，表示未設定。This property determines how often the labels and major tick marks and grid lines associated with the axis are drawn if the `Interval` property value of a label, tick mark, or grid line is set to , which signifies that it is not set. `Interval`主要刻度、 格線或軸的標籤屬性 的優先順序高於屬性設定為物件。The `Interval` property of a major tick mark, grid line or label of the axis has priority over the property setting of the object. 值為 0 表示 「 自動 」 值。A value of zero represents an "Auto" value. 這屬性不能設定為。This property cannot be set to . 如果您指派這個屬性的值，將改為使用值為零。If you assign this property a value of , a value of zero will be used instead. **請注意**次要格線和軸的刻度永遠不會使用這個屬性的間隔。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval. 軸間隔類型由屬性。The interval type of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode IntervalAutoMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會判斷座標軸是否使用固定數目的間隔，或者間隔的數目取決於座標軸的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines if a fixed number of intervals is used on the axis, or if the number of intervals depends on the axis size.

value.span: 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為 「 自動 」、屬性會決定應計算多少間隔。When the property is set to "Auto", the property determines how many intervals should be calculated. 如果您的圖表是調整大小，或重繪通常，您可以設定屬性，圖表，會在此情況下動態計算座標軸間隔。If your chart is resized or redrawn often, you can set the property to , in which case the chart will dynamically calculate axis intervals. 這是在圖表間隔顯示的位置不同，根據其資料的情況下特別有用。This is especially useful in situations where the chart intervals are displayed differently, depending on their data.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double IntervalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.IntervalOffset : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的間隔位移。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset of an axis.

value.span: 表示座標軸間隔位移的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the interval offset of an axis.

value.span: 預設值為 "Auto"，由零 (0) 這個值表示。

span.span: The default value is "Auto", which is represented by a value of zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性決定座標軸的間隔位移。The property determines the interval offset of an axis. 這個值會做為座標軸的標籤的主要刻度和格線，如果相關聯的軸間隔位移`IntervalOffset`未設定屬性值的標籤、 刻度標記或格線，這由值。This value is used as the interval offset of an axis' labels and the major tick marks and grid lines associated with the axis if the `IntervalOffset` property value of the labels, tick marks, or grid lines is not set, which is represented by a value of . 刻度、 標籤與軸的格線屬性 的優先順序高於屬性設定為物件。The property of the tick marks, labels and grid lines of an axis has priority over the property setting of the object. 值為 0 表示 「 自動 」 值。A value of zero represents an "Auto" value. 此外，不能設定為未設定 (也就是)。Also, cannot be set to not set (that is, a ). 如果您指派，「 自動 」 的值 — 也就是值為零，將改為使用。If you assign , a value of "Auto"—that is, a value of zero—will be used instead. **請注意**次要格線和軸的刻度永遠不會使用這個屬性為其間隔位移。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval offset. 軸間隔位移的類型由屬性。The interval offset type of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalOffsetType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的間隔位移類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of an axis.

value.span: 座標軸的間隔位移類型。

span.span: The interval offset type of an axis.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會決定某個軸的間隔位移的類型，而且如果用於座標軸的標籤，主要刻度會與格線的間隔位移類型軸項目的自己`IntervalOffsetType`屬性值設定為。This property determines the interval offset type of an axis, and is used for the interval offset type of an axis' labels, and major tick marks or grid lines if the axis element's own `IntervalOffsetType` property value is set to . 此屬性設定為的值會導致正在使用 (只例如等主要格線的軸項目可以設定為)。Setting this property to will result in a value of being used (only the axis elements such as major grid lines, etc. can be set to ). > [!NOTE] > 次要格線和軸的刻度永遠不會使用這個屬性，其間隔位移類型。The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval offset type. 軸的間隔由屬性。The interval of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的間隔類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval type of an axis.

value.span: 表示座標軸間隔類型的 。

span.span: A that represents the interval type of an axis.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性決定的軸間隔類型，而且如果用於座標軸的標籤、 主要刻度標記或主要格線的間隔類型軸項目的自己`IntervalType`屬性值設定為。This property determines the interval type of an axis, and is used for the interval type of an axis' labels, major tick marks, or major grid lines if the axis element's own `IntervalType` property value is set to . 此屬性設定為的值會導致正在使用。Setting this property to will result in a value of being used. 只有軸項目，例如格線、 可以設定為。Only the axis elements, such as grid lines, can be set to . **請注意**次要格線和軸的刻度永遠不會使用這個屬性的間隔類型。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval type. 軸的間隔由屬性。The interval of the axis is determined by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果軸間隔類型由時間，例如小時、 分鐘等等，則順序才能正確運作，縮放必須設定為時間值。If the axis interval type is represented by a time such as hours, minutes, and so forth, then in order for zooming to function correctly, the must be set to a time value as well. 例如，如果 ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType 設定為 [小時]，然後 ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType 無法設為是分鐘。For example, if ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType is set to hours, then ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType could be set to minutes.

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會判斷如果座標軸的交叉點發生變更，刻度標記和座標軸標籤是否會隨著座標軸一起移動。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether tick marks and axis labels move with an axis if the crossing point of an axis changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ LabelStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the properties of an axis.

value.span: 定義座標軸標籤樣式的 物件。

span.span: A object, which defines the axis label style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此屬性指定的樣式、 格式化、 等等的軸標籤。Use this property to specify the style, formatting, and so forth, of axis labels. 如果屬性是`true`、 字型大小、 字型角度和位移標籤將會自動決定。If the property is `true`, the font size, font angle and the use of offset labels are determined automatically. 如果您設定任何一個 LabelStyle.Font.Size或屬性屬性將設定為`false`。If you set any one of the LabelStyle.Font.Size, or properties, the property will be set to `false`. 請注意，如果沒有時間適用於標籤，包含日期的格式和所使用的資料點值指定的時間、 時間將會影響資料點的位置，即使它們不會顯示由於標籤格式。Note that if a format that consists of a date without a time is used for labels, and the data point values that are used specify times, the times will affect the positions of the data points, even though they are not displayed due to the label formatting.

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的線條色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the line color of an axis.

value.span: 物件，表示用來繪製座標軸的線條色彩。

span.span: A object that represents the line color used to draw the axis.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定軸的線條色彩。Use the property to specify the line color of an axis. **請注意**如果座標軸未啟用，但相鄰的座標軸會使用格線，其中一個這些格線會顯示取代未啟用的座標軸。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果將會發生同樣的情況下座標軸的屬性設定為。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在此情況下，軸不會用來繪製的資料，並會改為繪製相鄰軸的格線。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle LineDashStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the line style of an axis.

value.span: 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定用於軸的線條樣式。The property determines the line style used for an axis. 可以是實線、 虛線，等等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. **請注意**如果座標軸未啟用，但相鄰的座標軸會使用格線，其中一個這些格線會顯示取代未啟用的座標軸。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果將會發生同樣的情況下座標軸的屬性設定為。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在此情況下，軸不會用來繪製的資料，並會改為繪製相鄰軸的格線。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的線條寛度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the line width of an axis, in pixels.

value.span: 表示座標軸線條寬度的 值。

span.span: An value that represents the width of an axis line.

value.span: 預設值為一 (1) 個像素。

span.span: The default value is one (1) pixel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得或設定軸線，寬度的像素為單位。The property gets or sets the width of an axis line, in pixels. 如果寬度設定為零 (0)，不會顯示線條。If the width is set to zero (0), the line will not be displayed. **請注意**如果座標軸未啟用，但相鄰的座標軸會使用格線，其中一個這些格線會顯示取代未啟用的座標軸。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果將會發生同樣的情況下座標軸的屬性設定為。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在此情況下，軸不會用來繪製的資料，並會改為繪製相鄰軸的格線。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

span.span: Gets or sets a value for the logarithm base for the logarithmic axis.

value.span: 值。

span.span: A value.

value.span: 預設值為以 10 為基底。

span.span: The default value is base 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性才會有作用時屬性設定為`true`。This property only has an effect when the property is set to `true`. 請注意，這個屬性只適用於這些用來繪製資料值座標軸。Note that this property is only applicable to value axes, which are used to plot data. 設定這個屬性的類別目錄軸會導致擲回例外狀況。Setting this property for a categorical axis will result in an exception being thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ MajorGrid { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，這個物件可用來設定座標軸的主要格線屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a object used to set the major grid line properties for an axis.

value.span: 物件，這個物件可用來取得或設定座標軸的主要格線屬性。

span.span: A object used to get or set the major grid properties of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要格線會永遠繪製搭配資料點。Major grid lines are always drawn in conjunction with a data point. 也就是說，它們會在座標軸的資料點，類別目錄軸刻度標記與相同的點。That is, they will occur at the same point along an axis as a data point, for categorical axis tick marks. 值軸的預設的主要格線線條會繪製只要標籤就會發生。For value axes, major grid lines by default are drawn wherever labels occur. 您可以使用這個屬性來變更主要格線列頻率、 色彩以及其他等等。You can use this property to change major grid line frequency, color, and so forth.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ MajorTickMark { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，這個物件可用來設定座標軸的主要刻度標記屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a object used to set the major tick mark properties of an axis.

value.span: 物件，這個物件可用來設定座標軸的主要刻度標記屬性。

span.span: A object used to set the properties of a major tick mark of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要刻度會永遠繪製搭配資料點。Major tick marks are always drawn in conjunction with a data point. 類別目錄軸刻度會在座標軸的資料點與相同的點。Categorical axis tick marks will occur at the same point along an axis as a data point. 值軸的主要刻度會繪製依預設，只要標籤就會發生。For value axes, major tick marks are drawn by default wherever labels occur. 您可以使用這個屬性來變更主要刻度標記屬性，例如頻率、 色彩或大小。You can use this property to change the major tick mark properties such as frequency, color, or size.

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的最小值。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum value of an axis.

value.span: 表示座標軸最小值的 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，是否您明確將此值，X 值的資料元素必須加以考量。Note that if you set this value explicitly, the X-values of data elements must be taken into account. 如果所有資料點 X 值為零，控制項將假設使用第一個資料點，就會發生在零處。If all data points have X-values of zero, the control will assume the first data point occurs at zero. 此外，如果明確設定值，則屬性將被忽略。Also, if the value is explicitly set, the property will be ignored. 值必須小於值。The value must be less than the value. 若要自動捨入軸的最大和最小值。To automatically round the maximum and minimum axis values. 呼叫方法。call the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，這個物件可用來指定座標軸的次要格線屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a object used to specify the minor grid lines attributes of an axis.

value.span: 物件，這個物件可用來取得或設定座標軸的次要格線屬性。

span.span: A object used to get or set the attributes of the minor grid lines of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 次要格線的線條會繪製之間的主要格線。Minor grid lines are drawn in between the major grid lines. 此屬性用於變更屬性的次要格線的線條，例如頻率、 色彩以及其他等等。Use this property to change the attributes of a minor grid line, such as frequency, color, and so forth.

span.span: A object used for the minor tick mark properties of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 次要刻度應該繪製主要刻度，通常發生標籤之間。Minor tick marks should be drawn between major tick marks, where labels usually occur. 使用這個屬性來變更次要刻度標記的頻率、 色彩以及其他等等。Use this property to change the minor tick mark frequency, color, and so forth.

summary.span: 自動將座標軸的值捨入。

span.span: Automatically rounds axis values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫要捨入的軸值的方法。Call the method to round the values of an axis. 請注意時呼叫這個方法時，不會變更使用座標軸的間隔。Note that the interval used for the axis will not be changed when this method is called. X 和 X2 才支援這個方法座標軸。This method is only supported for the X and X2 axes. 根據預設將會四捨五入 Y 和 Y2 的軸值。The Y and Y2 axes values are rounded by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的對齊方式的值為， ，和。Possible alignment values are , , and . 值為等同於的頂端或右邊，根據軸或帶狀線的方向的對齊方式。A value of equates to an alignment to the top or the right, depending on the orientation of the axis or strip line. 以相同方式，也就是值為等同於到底部或右邊的對齊方式。In the same manner, a value of equates to an alignment to the bottom or the right. 如果您想要更充分掌控軸標題的位置，您必須執行自訂繪圖使用或事件。If you want more control over the positioning of an axis title, you must perform custom drawing using the or event. 您可以進一步對齊和位置的標題物件使用其和 TitleAngle 屬性。You can further align and position the titles of objects by using their and TitleAngle properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定標題的字型屬性，例如朝或大小。Gets or sets title font properties such as face or size. 若要設定字型屬性，在執行的階段、 新必須建立物件。To set font properties at run time, a new object must be created. 任何嘗試變更的目前內容物件在執行階段會導致編譯錯誤。Any attempt to change the properties of the current object at run time will result in a compilation error.
